topic: Cognitive biases affecting pattern recognition in the solar energy sector
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that the pattern I see is influenced by my unique experiences and perspectives, which may not be shared by others. To address this, my next step is to gather feedback from diverse individuals to test the significance of this pattern and refine my understanding. I will also develop a clear and compelling way to communicate the pattern, emphasizing its potential benefits or insights, to foster collaborative exploration and validation.

metadata.trigger: What pattern do I keep seeing that others might be missing?
